entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending after midnight then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023
